name: INUIAddVoiceShortcutButtonDelegate
desc: The protocol an object implements to receive notifications from the Siri Shortcut button.

items.name: func present(INUIAddVoiceShortcutViewController, for: INUIAddVoiceShortcutButton)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to present the Add Shortcut view controller.

items.name: func present(INUIEditVoiceShortcutViewController, for: INUIAddVoiceShortcutButton)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to present the Edit Shortcut view controller.
